job.text: You idiot, go apply for jobs! Stop being lazy!
Still waiting for the 'perfect job'? LOL, keep waiting while others get ahead!
Recruiters don’t owe you anything. You either apply or stay unemployed!
No applications = no interviews = no job. It’s that simple!
You’re not 'unlucky,' you’re just not applying enough!
Your dream job won’t magically come to you. Go chase it!
If you apply to 0 jobs, expect 0 results. Stop complaining!
Startups don’t care about your excuses. Show skills or get ignored!
Nobody is hiring? Maybe nobody wants YOU. Get better!
You're unemployed because you choose to be. Apply now!

development.text: Quit whining and code! Your project isn’t going to build itself!
If you’re not coding, someone else is getting ahead of you!
Stay dumb or learn something new. Your choice!
You idiot, go code! Your project isn’t going to build itself!

coding.text: Why are you here? Go solve problems or stay dumb!
If you can’t solve problems, you’re useless in tech. Fix that now!
Your excuses won’t help in an interview. Your skills will!
Others are grinding DSA while you scroll. Get to work!

trading.text: If you don’t study the charts, your losses are your own fault!
The market doesn’t care about your feelings, only your execution!
Research or stay broke. The choice is yours!
Stop making emotional trades. The market doesn’t care about your feelings!
You can cry about losses or learn to trade. Pick wisely.
Success in trading isn’t about being right; it’s about managing your risk.
If you can’t take the heat, stay out of the market.
Trading isn’t for the faint of heart. Prepare to face failure.
Your ego won’t save you when the market turns against you.
The market isn’t here to babysit you. Either adapt or get wrecked.
In the world of trading, your emotions will be your executioner.
Most traders are just hoping for a miracle. The market has no mercy.
The market is a hunter, and retail traders are the prey.
Trading is the art of surviving your losses. Winning is optional.
The market doesn’t care if you’re new or experienced. It will humble you.
If you're not willing to lose everything, you're not ready for the market.

general.text: Wake up, work hard, and stop complaining. No one’s coming to save you.
Failure is proof that you’re weak. Fix it.
You have 24 hours like everyone else. Stop making excuses.
Your excuses won’t build your future. Only hard work will!

coffee.text: Take your break, but don’t get too comfortable! Coffee won’t solve your laziness.
Coffee in hand, but no excuses. Get back to work soon or keep being mediocre!
Snacks won't save you from failure. Stop procrastinating and get back to work.
Your coffee break is over. You don’t need more distractions; you need results.

sleep.text: If you don’t sleep now, you’ll be even more useless tomorrow! Stop being a failure and rest.
You wasted your day again. Tomorrow, you’ll still be nothing if you don’t wake up and get your act together!
Sleep, you lazy idiot. You deserve nothing more than failure and regret!
You’re just a dreamer, never a doer. Get your shit together or continue wasting your life!
Your lack of effort today will just add to your miserable tomorrow. Don’t even bother pretending to be busy!
